hooks.name: gravityview_az_filter_parameter
hooks.description: Modify the URL parameter used to filter the alphabet by.

hooks.name: gravityview_blocklist_field_types
hooks.description: Filters the blocklist field types value.

parameters.name: blocklist_field_types
parameters.description: Array of fields not to be filtered due to storage types (JSON, serialized).

hooks.name: gravityview/az_filter/anchor
hooks.description: Modifies the anchor ID added to the end of the letter filter links. Return empty string to remove.

parameters.name: az_widget_anchor
parameters.description: The anchor in the format #gv-widget-az_filter-\{integer widget counter\}

hooks.name: gravityview/az_filter/collation
hooks.description: Override the default query collation for the letter comparison.

parameters.name: collation_override
parameters.description: The collation override for the query. May be necessary to limit results with non-latin characters containing accents. Return a valid collation to override, like 'utf8mb4_bin'.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The MySQL query passed to the database.

hooks.name: gravityview/az_filter/parameter

parameters.name: parameter
parameters.description: The URL parameter used to filter the alphabet by. For example, you could use starts_with as the parameter, and the link would be /view/example/?starts_with=a instead of /view/example/?letter=a
